text: Christopher Michael Pratt (born June 21, 1979) is an American actor. He is known for his television roles as Harold Brighton "Bright" Abbott in the series Everwood, Ch√© in The O.C. (2003), and Andy Dwyer and Parks and Recreation (2009), a role which garnered him a Critics' Choice nomination for Best Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series in 2013. He was also the voice of Emmet in the 2014 animated film The Lego Movie and its sequel The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019). In recent years, Pratt is known for his role as Owen in the Jurassic Park series beginning in the 2015 film Jurassic World, in Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom (2018), and in Jurassic World Dominion (2022). ==Personal life== Pratt was born in Virginia, Minnesota on June 21, 1979. He was raised in Lake Stevens, Washington. He married Anna Faris in 2009. Their son, Jack Pratt, was born August 25, 2012. In 2017, Pratt and Faris legally separated and divorced in 2018. He later married author Katherine Schwarzenegger in 2019. They have two daughters. == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes 1995 The Steal Producers' Assistant Crew 2003 The Extreme Team Keenan 2005 Strangers with Candy Brason 2005 Path of Destruction Nathan McCain TV Movie 2007 Walk the Talk Cam 2008 Wieners Bobby 2008 Wanted Barry 2009 The Multi-Hyphenate Chris Short Film 2009 Bride Wars Fletcher 2009 Deep in the Valley Lester Watts 2009 Jennifer's Body Officer Roman Duda 2011 Take Me Home Tonight Kyle Masterson 2011 Moneyball Scott Hatteberg 2011 10 Years Cully 2011 What's Your Number?
